review: Dr.  Anibha Pandy is really a very nice and experienced doctor. Clinic was very neat n clean. No crowd was there. She attended my baby patiently. Charges are not high.

Wonderful experience with  Dr. Anibha as a first timer. 
She has been very friendly and always ensures that I am properly informed about my health and care.
 I’ve never had to wait when I arrive on time for an appointment.

************** sensitive, informative…
A great doctor 
I recommend her

Communication gaps since day 1. She gave the wrong date to visit after discharge for jaundice evaluation. Had to visit the hospital twice which was quite a task post pregnancy. **** **** ***** ********* *** **** ******** *** *** ** ******* ***** I visited another doctor *** **** ** ** *********** **** *** ******** *** ***** ** ***** ******* ********** ** *** ***** Being a new mother I panicked when my child got fever the first time and so I messaged her on WhatsApp she was online saw my message at around 8 pm but chose to reply the next morning saying you’ll have to visit. By that time I had consulted another doctor who atleast gave an sos medicine till the wait for next morning* *** **** ***** *** ***** ****** **** ** * **** ** *** ********* **** * ****** **** ** **** *** ********* *******  Being a child doc one needs to understand that of course we would visit the next day but if there’s some emergency in night just telling to keep Crocin drops handy wasn’t much of a big deal to tell. ** ** **** *** ******** *** **** *********** ** *** ****** ******** ***** ******* 
I’ve consulted 2 paediatricians after these incidents *** ********** **** **** **** **** **** *** **** ******** ******** ** *** ********* **** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Cooperative,  very elaborative ... overall Excellent experience 

Make us understand about the issue in detail listening to us (observing kid behavior) in all I must say she is best in her performance
